data.message:
Definitely need to add a few more reactions. 
An "Awww" reactions to cute posts would be great.

replies.message: Hey Amanda. If you have a particular Reaction you'd like to see included, please let us know here: http://on.fb.me/1U8k4fU. We appreciate your feedback. -Kate

Facebook 
¤☻
Hi !

I am the owner of this site. 

globalmediaplanet(dot)info

I'm a journalist. My profession is journalism. All articles I posted on Facebook are disappeared and all removed from Facebook. 

If the link of my site was safe on Google, Yahoo, Bing, also on Facebook till now, everywhere, for years, is safe and now the same! 

I want to believe that Facebook mistakenly blocked this site on Facebook platform. 

The damage caused blocking my portal from time to time, from minute by minute is immeasurable for me and thousands of people! 

I want to immediately to strip unreasonable blockade site, which has no legal basis and no any reason.

All the rules and conditions of use Facebook are respected!

Thank you in advance!

Global Media

https://www.facebook.com/GlobalMediaInfo
Hey Amanda. If you have a particular Reaction you'd like to see included, please let us know here: http://on.fb.me/1U8k4fU. We appreciate your feedback. -Kate
I got spam before don't want to go through it again
